__e: He may be right, but it does not explain what this was doing last night.

Well, I guess that explains why she's not at the hospital.
Which explains why he just called me the one thing that no woman ever wants to be called.
Well, that doesn't explain... why you've come all the way out here, all the way out here to hell.
He may be right, but it does not explain what this was doing last night.
I obviously know what you're talking about, but for the kid's sake, why don't you explain what that place is?
Well, this is all fine and good, but it doesn't explain what happened to my mother's body.
Yes, but why didn't you say so before?
You know, I know you don't like talking about it, but it sure does explain a lot.

Which doesn't explain why she was in his apartment, which was his, but now it isn'T.

All right, it explains why it went after you.
Which doesn't explain why she was in his apartment, which was his, but now it isn'T.
All right, it explains why it went after you.
Yeah, but that doesn't explain why she's going to you and not the police!
